languages.text: Lightning strikes the psyker and {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>psy rating</u>{/g} targets around them (both allies and enemies), dealing <u>(2 × psy rating)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to them.
languages.original_text: Псайкера и {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>пси-рейтинг</u>{/g} целей (как союзных, так и враждебных), находящихся рядом с ним, поражает молния, нанося по <u>(2 × пси-рейтинг)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}урона{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lightning strikes the psyker and <u>psy rating</u> targets around them (both allies and enemies), dealing <u>(2 × psy rating)</u> damage to them.

Lightning strikes the psyker and {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>psy rating</u>{/g} targets around them (both allies and enemies), dealing <u>(2 × psy rating)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to them.

languages.text: 灵能者会被闪电击中，周围等同于{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>灵能等级</u>{/g}数量的其他生物也同样会被闪电击中（不分敌我），所有被闪电击中的生物受到<u>（2×灵能等级）</u>点{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}。
languages.original_text: Lightning strikes the psyker and {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>psy rating</u>{/g} targets around them (both allies and enemies), dealing <u>(2 × psy rating)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g} to them.

traits.locale_text: 灵能者会被闪电击中，周围等同于{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>灵能等级</u>{/g}数量的其他生物也同样会被闪电击中（不分敌我），所有被闪电击中的生物受到<u>（2×灵能等级）</u>点伤害。

languages.text: Un rayo golpea al psíquico y a {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>factor psíquico</u>{/g} objetivos a su alrededor (aliados y enemigos), infligiendo <u>(2 × factor psíquico)</u> de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g}.

languages.text: 閃光が異能者を襲い、{g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>超能力レート</u>{/g}が(敵味方問わず)周囲をターゲットに<u>(2 × 超能力レート)</u>の{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}ダメージ{/g}を与える。

languages.text: Der Psioniker und {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>Psi-Wert</u>{/g} Ziele um ihn herum (Verbündete und Feinde) werden vom Blitz getroffen, was ihnen <u>(2 × Psi-Wert)</u> {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schaden{/g} zufügt.

languages.text: La foudre frappe le psyker et {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>indice psy</u>{/g} cibles qui l'entourent (aussi bien alliées qu'ennemies) en leur infligeant <u>(2 × indice psy)</u> points de {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g}.

languages.text: Ruhsezeri ve etrafındaki {g|Encyclopedia:PsyRating}<u>ruhsezi derecesi</u>{/g} kadar hedefi (hem düşman hem dost birim) yıldırım çarparak onlara <u>(2 × ruhsezi derecesi)</u> kadar {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}hasar{/g} verir.
